author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

MessageLogger is one of the Services always available in the framework. Following the improved configuration validation already in python, this PR suggests to move the MessageLogger default configuration to be available in the `cms.Process` without any extra action. This change allows using `ProcessModifier`s in any cff/cfi fragment to e.g. add new categories for which Info messages would be printed out (see e.g. discussion in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/35117).

Resolves https://github.com/makortel/framework/issues/272

#### PR validation:

Framework unit tests run.
title: Move MessageLogger default configuration to be part of Process
